channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- PeopleSoft Enterprise SCM eProcurement
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- PeopleSoft Enterprise SCM eProcurement

item.title: CVE-2019-3001|2024-10-15T18:45:00.782Z -- oracle%20corporation -- peoplesoft%20enterprise%20scm%20eprocurement
item.description: Vulnerability in the PeopleSoft Enterprise SCM eProcurement product of Oracle PeopleSoft (component: eProcurement). The supported version that is affected is 9.2. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise PeopleSoft Enterprise SCM eProcurement. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized read access to a subset of PeopleSoft Enterprise SCM eProcurement accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 5.3 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N).
